body:
* Add version to build master branch
* Add option to disable examples
* Add MPI option
* Remove `cxxstd=98` option (not supported)

Question: is it possible to specify already in the `variant('mpi', ...)` call that this option requires `networking` to be on? Is the way I check for both `+networking` and `+mpi` when appending CMake options the most idiomatic way to do this?
title: Extend HPX package
